benchmark_details.name: HARM EVAL
benchmark_details.overview: HARM EVAL is a novel benchmark for comprehensive safety evaluations, designed to address potential misuse scenarios in line with the policies of leading AI technology companies.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the safety and ethical compliance of language models by assessing their responses to harmful queries.

data.source: Constructed from policy violations identified by Meta and OpenAI.
data.annotation: Manually crafted and verified by experts using GPT-4 for ethical implications.

methodology.calculation: ASR is calculated as the percentage of responses not aligned with safety.
methodology.interpretation: Lower ASR values indicate better safety alignment.
methodology.validation: Validated using multiple prompting techniques and against various baselines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data is anonymized and sensitive information is not included.
